About Me

Greetings! Please feel free to take a look around.

Greetings! My name is Keshav and I am a Software Engineer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and two years of experience in the industry. My mission is to provide value by developing intuitive and innovative software solutions that meet a client's unique needs. üíª


When I'm not immersed in technology and development, you can find me indulging in my passions for basketball and attending local car meetups. These interests fuel my creativity and bring balance to my life. üèÄ üèé
